website_summaries.verdict: Designed from high-impact plastic, it produces unique sounds that work best for beginning duck callers.
pros: Calls in mallard ducks from the skies with simple techniques
Proven field technology from Phil Robertson
cons: The duck call is made from a solid piece of plastic, which doesn't allow for any fine-tuning or customization

customer_reviews.title: Know which end is which!
customer_reviews.text: I jump shot ducks a long time ago but never used a call. I moved to the city where we have resident mallards all over the place. I thought it would be fun to "talk" to them so I got this call. I had never used one and figured to blow in the skinny or small end. I was disappointed until I read a review that talked about stuck reeds and blowing in the other end. When I did, Holy Phil Robertson, I WAS a duck!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I used this in the orchestra pit in a broadway ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the orchestra pit in a broadway show....got laughs every night! Not sure if it would attract a real duck, though....
customer_reviews.author: Samuel James Tumminello IV

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice little duck call
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a nice little duck call. Very raspy. Only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because it's actually a little toy-like rattly. I only realized that when I finally broke down and bought a $100+ acrylic call. Before that, I this was my favorite call --- but compared to high-end calls, this one sounds a little toy-like. But like I said...for the money, this is a very nice little call. I've used it to entice many wary greenheads that eventually ended up on my strap.
customer_reviews.author: Qback5

customer_reviews.title: Old man approved.
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding duck call on the market under $150. The old man stole it from me after our first hunt together. Easy to use even with gloves on and soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pakulski

customer_reviews.title: Great call
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best call for the money. Has great sound and easy to use. So glad i bought this. Much better than Haydel HR85
customer_reviews.author: Craig in WV

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Call with a Good Deep Mallard Sound (RASPY)
customer_reviews.text: I have severa of the DC calls and picked this one up as I wanted one that was a little lower and more grit than the Duck Picker. I found this one to have a good tone and raspy sound to it with no problem rolling through all my types of calls. It is a great low-end call and perfect for a beginner, but will also be something I add to my own lanyard when mallard season kicks in to full migration. I would use this or the Triple Threat for general mallard calling over the Duck Picker.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kollman

customer_reviews.title: Great call for a first timer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use call, nice raspy call with little effort, great first call
customer_reviews.author: Scowt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use But...
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner call. Easy to use but reeds easily get wet and stick especially in rain. Not very loud but ok for low flying ducks or to add to other calls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Great duck call but don't expect it to be good for everything
customer_reviews.text: I have many calls some around the $150 range and I will go to this one when the ducks are in close. It's not a loud call there's not much range to it but for a little quack when they're close this is the ticket. If you get the pressure right, this is the most realistic sounding call I've heard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a duck!
customer_reviews.text: I think it sounds very much like a duck, we'll see if it works while hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I am no pro but I call and sometimes they ...
customer_reviews.text: I am no pro but I call and sometimes they answer/turn. It does sound different then others I have owned in the past...sounds more umm raspy :)
customer_reviews.author: skipE777

customer_reviews.title: Calling all mallards.
customer_reviews.text: Quuack, this is a great starter quacker and easy to pick up no go.
customer_reviews.author: J chong

customer_reviews.title: Great all around call!
customer_reviews.text: Great call. Really smooth and extra raspy! Very easy for mastering your feed call.
customer_reviews.author: WBT

customer_reviews.title: Quack
customer_reviews.text: Great little call for the ducks. Went down to the creek in town and hit the call and 30 ducks showed up. Seems to work if that happens right? Price is hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect name for it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely raspy. Not as scratchy as an elite but for the price difference between the 2 I’d go with duck commander any day. If it ends up MIA the replacement pains won’t hurt so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: The sounds of a good slaying
customer_reviews.text: Good call but after a day of use in very wet conditions the reeds stuck together. I was bummed it stopped working but after blowing some air through the other side it was back to functional.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: raspy duck
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely is what they say it is. a Very raspy duck. good sound. you can call as loud as you want and it won't squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Hvan

customer_reviews.title: Great call at a great price
customer_reviews.text: i like the raspy sound that this call makes. It's a double reed and does not stick when moist. Great, reliable call. This one is one of my favorites (apart from my acrylics). I am a beginner, and this call makes calling seem like your second language.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good simple duck call and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Good call
customer_reviews.text: This call is actually pretty decent. My young kids can even get a pretty decent sound out of it. I will get it tested this year. Good raspy call to have as an option
customer_reviews.author: Turkey Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Ole Raspy's gonna be an ole favorite
customer_reviews.text: Awesome call that will work very well for duck calling beginners. This call is very simple to work, by simply blowing into the call you are 95% of the way to sounding like a duck. The call appears to be of good quality and arrived very quickly after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AirForce9019

customer_reviews.title: So effortless to blow. Anyone can blow this call.
customer_reviews.text: Easiest call I’ve ever used. This is my forever duck call hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: My go to call. When others lock up this ...
customer_reviews.text: My go to call. When others lock up this one keeps going. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Now i have my Duck call to call all my Anaheim Duck fans on road games. Let's go Ducks!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Fierro

customer_reviews.title: Duck Call
customer_reviews.text: What's to say? It's a duck call and sounds like a duck. We might get to see if it actually calls ducks when the next hunting season opens. The imprint on the side verifies that it is a Duck Commander product.
customer_reviews.author: Janina Villa

customer_reviews.title: ... always wanted to see what the Duck Commanders were like. this one works pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to see what the Duck Commanders were like. this one works pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Great call
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is a beginner duck caller/ hunter. He was easily able to make some nice duck sounds right out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carlson

customer_reviews.title: It is the best sound I have heard yet
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wait to try this call this next year. It is the best sound I have heard yet. Hope the ducks think so. They do at the park :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Friend

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sound
customer_reviews.text: This call has a really low tone that sounds great. Very easy to use and a solid call. I would definitely recommend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: jason oberle

customer_reviews.title: Another great Duck Commander Product
customer_reviews.text: This is made to do one thing and that is quack. This call is very, very easy to use. is not very loud would be better suited for small lakes or canals.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great Gifts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as gifts. Needless to say, we have had so much fun with them. They work great and now the men in the house have a Duck Commander Duck Call!!!
customer_reviews.author: patt

customer_reviews.title: Different Call
customer_reviews.text: Decent call... Still getting use to it but I like the fact of having a raspy call while others are using a younger hen. Not my first pick on my lanyard but not the last!
customer_reviews.author: Forever Samcro

customer_reviews.title: Ole' Raspy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandson and he thinks it is great. I did not want to spend a lot of money so this duck call was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother's birthday. He loved it, it was funny when we heard the duck sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joetta Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a duck is in the house
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. Sounds like a duck is in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great call!
customer_reviews.text: Very raspy and has a good mix when putting it together with another call. Mixing this in with two buddy's and we have a bunch of decoys out make it seem like there is a party going on down there! Great Duck Commander call!
customer_reviews.author: Qwack Smacker

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price of a plastic model
customer_reviews.text: This is a plastic call that works well...fine for the price. Good beginner model...we used as part of a Duck Dynasty gift basket.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie McParland

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, but haven't had a chance to use it yet, my buddy flaked on our duck trip.
customer_reviews.author: The Zissou

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Does sound more raspy then normal duck calls. Easy to use. Built to last. Great value at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Tharrod

customer_reviews.title: I do love this one
customer_reviews.text: I do love this one...great raspy sound..This is a call that anyone can use with very little practice..I reccommend this one..
customer_reviews.author: joe thompson

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for
customer_reviews.text: This call is amazing. Has I good sound to it and has many applications. I have used it to pull pranks on my coworkers and during airsoft games, nerf wars. The satisfaction of an enemy poking their head around the Corner and starring down the end of a barrel is hilarious. Overall a wonderful call by my favorite rednecks
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. I am a beginner caller, but I could tell right away that my buddies calls were much higher quality. This one sounds like a kazoo compared to the good ones. But the better I get the better it sounds, but I can still hear that synthetic tone to it. I did drop it at the lake and found it 3 weeks later after a snowstorm so it seems good quality. To me it sounds best for short quacks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but deadly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son and have since purchase one for myself - THIS CALLER IS DEADLY TO DUCKS! I don't know what it is about this caller but it just keeps the mallards circling again and again! Despite being the cheapest caller on my lanyard it is fast becoming my favourite go-to caller! The seller was great too - prompt international shipping which had it on my doorstep within 2 weeks - despite being sent halfway around the world! The Duck Commander crew sure know their stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and you may be able to control ...
customer_reviews.text: Hunters will find this strange, but we use this to call our dog with. That's right. We don't call ducks, we call our blind, partially deaf rescue rat terrier. When she hears it, she immediately turns and comes toward us. We also have an acrylic Ducks Unlimited duck call and this sounds very similar to it, maybe a little more raspy. Easy to use and you may be able to control your dog with it :P
customer_reviews.author: Maryboo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Should make Phil proud If you want a duck call this is it! We need more Phil and Kay and less Kim and Kanye!
customer_reviews.author: W. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Old Raspy
customer_reviews.text: Have not shot a duck in years, but wanted one of the Commander calls just to have it. Enjoy making the backyard birds wonder what the heck is going on. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Pinson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with a unique sound but it is hard to correcty use the feeding chuckle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Christopher Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Duck Call
customer_reviews.text: This call has such a great sound and is so easy to use. It sounds just like the calls they use on TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie

customer_reviews.title: Only used a Halloween prop.
customer_reviews.text: Used only as a Halloween prop, but completed the costume perfectly. Si would have been really proud of the costume.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had in mind
customer_reviews.text: The plastic case is not what I had expected. The use of the call is not documented with instruction(not included).
customer_reviews.author: dlewis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I Loved it. I'm training my boy friend to come when I call him. Very easy to use, to call what ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Girdvain

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My 18month old daughter loves it... This season we'll see how well it calls. Nothing further to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Williams

customer_reviews.title: The duck call is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much!!!!The duck call was here very quickly too .have a nice day!It sounds like the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Merlin L. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Love it - sounds grreat - nice and loud
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's Duck Commanmder, what can I say, hey. I'm happy, happy, happy with it. Five more words required? - hey, what am I, a novelist.
customer_reviews.author: Elvin

customer_reviews.title: Was opened
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to get this in today. I bought this for my nephew's birthday and when it arrived the plastic packaging the call came in had been opened and poorly taped back together. Horrible presentation. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loves it. Easy to use and all together fun!! Recommend it to all :)
customer_reviews.author: WJM

customer_reviews.title: More CRAPPY Duck Dynesty junk since the show started
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a sick, dying duck. None Of my ducks even like it. It's tha crappy. More Duck Dynesty overpriced bullc***. Now it works to sight in my .22 for squirrles. It's a P.O.S., like All their calls since that stupid show started. Do they even hunt with this junk? Their calls suck now.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarasaweapon

product_meta.title: DUCK COMMANDER Ole Raspy Duck Call- Mallard Hen, Easy to Blow Low & Raspy Sounds, Hunting Waterfowl Lanyard Accessories
product_meta.description: You're a true fan of Duck Dynasty and now you can be a true Duck Commander with the Duck Dynasty Duck Commander Ole Raspy Duck Call. Use this easy to blow call to attract mallard hens. This call is great for beginners and is a great addition to any hunters duck call lanyard. This call has been around for over 30 years and has proven itself again and again. This is made of durable plastic and a patented double reed and friction fit system.
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR BEGINNER'S- Perfect duck call for all types of hunters but especially for those that are learning
UNIQUE SOUND- Low and super raspy sounds to attract mallard hens
DURABLE MATERIAL- Made of high impact plastic
EASY TO BLOW - Phil Robertson's Patented Double-reed, friction fit system
PROVEN FIELD TECHNOLOGY- Original style and sound that have bee used for over 30 years and made Duck Commander and Phil Robertson famous

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
